column1: ,ScubaSteve5678,2012-09-04T20:43Z,"Any chance you can get no easy day I know it just came out today but was hoping you could work some magic

,whiskeytango75,2012-09-04T22:22Z,"What a mission to be able to log in(I’m on Virgin and TPB is “off limits”)  Long story short, I have a friend who’s wife loves reading and he has recently bought her a kindle, the books she would like however I do not have nor can I find the and I was hoping you could help, even if only with a few.  This list is extensive but they are ones she’s missing to finish the collections.  Any would be of great help.

column2: – Hollow Core      /  &  - Devils in the mirror
– Towers of silence      / &   -   Crying out loud       /&  -   Split second

column1: Anything you can help with will be greatly appreciated.  Thank you very much for you amazing uploads."
next time you can post a request on Superbay (TPB forums) if you are having trouble connecting to TPB.
also there is a thread up there with fresh list of proxies.
anyway, here is another one of your books I uploaded.
Rizzoli and Isles Series by Tess Gerritsen (Books 1 to 10)
Thank you so much i really appreciate all your help. "
